decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 15 (Boundary Treatments). What little information has been submitted demonstrates a reduction in the quality of the development when compared to the approved drawings and and has therefore failed to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Conditions 13 (Construction Management Plan), 14 (Levels), 15 (Boundary Treatments), and 17 (Solar Panels) of permission 21/03301/FUL (Removal of the existing outbuilding and the erection of part single, part two storey rear extension and two storey side extension in association with creation of 1no. one-bedroom unit and 1no. three-bedroom unit with associated parking, landscaping, amenity space, refuse/recycling facilities and cycle storage)
